actions.message:
```
Flavor Packet Alpha 3.4.2 Help List
**Generic**

  fl.Help                   Lists available commands
  fl.SendEmbed              Sends an embed message
  fl.UserInfo               Displays the user's information
  fl.ChannelInfo            Displays the channel's information
  fl.RoleInfo [role-name]   Displays info for the role
  fl.Slap [@user]           Slaps the mentioned user
  fl.FlipCoin               Returns "Heads" or "Tails"
  fl.GenNumber [min] [max]  Returns a random number
  fl.ByteCoins              Display's the user's ByteCoins
  fl.Gamble                 The user randomly gains or loses some ByteCoins

**Text**

  fl.OffendEverybody        You might not want to do this one
  fl.GiveCoffee             You're not supposed to- *screaming in background*
  fl.PythonLesson           The world's best python lesson
  fl.IWantYuri              Do you want Yuri from DDLC back?
  fl.WubbaLubba             DUB DUB
  fl.KeyboardMap            Keyboard map for Lenovo S145 (Basically Useless)
  fl.CommandThatDoesNothing *nothing*
  fl.HowDumbAmI             Shows what percent dumb you are

**Moderation**

  fl.Flush                  Delete all messages in the current channel
  fl.GiveInvitation         Make an invitation with unlimited uses and time
  fl.KickMe                 It kicks you. Don't know why you would want to do that.
  fl.Ban                    Bans mentioned member
  fl.kick                   Kicks mentioned member

**Dev Commands**

  fl.PrepareShutdown        Prepares the shutdown of me ):
  fl.Init                   Initializes me
  fl.Test                   Tests the bots ability to send messages
```

This is an embed message.

One may add a description and/or multiple fields.

Use "Send Embed Description" and "Add Embed Field" before sending the embed message in order to customize it!

|ESC  F1 F2 F3 F4 F5 F6 F7 F8 F9 F10 F11 F12 PRTSC DEL|
|~    !  @  #  $  %  ^  &  *  (  )   _   +     INS    |
|`    1  2  3  4  5  6  7  8  9  0   -   =   BACKSPACE|
|TAB   Q  W  E  R  T  Y  U  I  O  P   [   ]   | \     |
|CAPSLK  A  S  D  F  G  H  J  K  L  ;  '         ENTER|
|SHIFT     Z  X  C  V  B  N  M  ,< .> /?         SHIFT|
|CTRL  FN  WIN  ALT  SPAAAAACE ALT CTRL        ←  ↕  →|

actions.message:
What's New in The May Update 1 (v3.4.2)?
---**Commands**---
*see help for descriptions.*
OffendEverybody
GiveCoffee
PythonLesson
IWantYuri
WubbaLubba
GiveInivitation
KickMe
KeyboardMap
CommandThatDoesNothing
PrepareShutdown
Init
Ban
Kick
HowDumbAmI
Changelog
---**Events**---
BotStart *Sends message to show bot is online*
BotError *Sends DBM and JavaScript Error Data*
BotJoin *Notifies of new bots*
BotLeave *Notifies of lost bots*
RoleCreate *Notifies of new roles*
RoleDelete *Notifies of lost roles*
ChannelCreate *Notifies of new channels*
ChannelDelete *Notifies of lost channels*
MemberBan *Notifies of members banned*
MemberUnban *Notifies of members unbanned*
VCCreate *Notifies of new Voice Channels*
VCDelete *Notifies of lost Voice Channels
EmojiCreate *Notifies of new Emoji*
EmojiDelete *Notifies of lost Emoji*
ServerChange *Gives server var change data*
MemberUpdate *Gives member var change data*
---**Misc**---
Prefix change from flavor_ to fl.
Help Updated
Help Categorized
Changed Gold to ByteCoin
Pulled an all-nighter to accomplish this
actions.name: Send Message
